name: CocoaPods
description: Install CocoaPods dependencies for Swift and Objective-C Cocoa projects
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: cwd
inputs.label: Working directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the working directory in which to execute this task. If left empty, the repository directory will be used.

inputs.name: forceRepoUpdate
inputs.label: Force repo update
inputs.helpMarkDown: Selecting this option will force running 'pod repo update' before install.

inputs.name: projectDirectory
inputs.label: Project directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optionally specify the path to the root of the project directory. If left empty, the project specified in the Podfile will be used. If no project is specified, then a search for an Xcode project will be made. If more than one Xcode project is found, an error will occur.

messages.PodReturnCode: The 'pod' command exited with return code: %d
